steps: Test template with minimal configuration first
Gradually add complexity after basic version works

monitoring_suggestions.recommendation: Implement 5-minute initial delay before status checks
monitoring_suggestions.rationale: Prevents server overload and allows proper processing time

monitoring_suggestions.recommendation: Monitor for success: false and status: error patterns
monitoring_suggestions.rationale: Catches both explicit error flags and status-based failures

monitoring_suggestions.recommendation: Continue monitoring even after successful completion
monitoring_suggestions.rationale: Verifies video URL accessibility and final delivery

monitoring_suggestions.recommendation: Update VideoGenerationStatus with detailed error messages
monitoring_suggestions.rationale: Provides visibility into failure reasons for debugging
